inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: OraQuick rapid test using venipuncture whole blood

inclusion.criterion: Screening CD4+ cell count less than or equal to 100 cells/mm(3)
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: CD4 < 100 cells/microL from an outside laboratory within 8 weeks prior to screening

inclusion.criterion: Residence within the wider Washington D.C. area (approximately within a 120-mile radius from the NIH Bethesda campus)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Active drug or alcohol use or dependence that, in the opinion of the investigator, would interfere with adherence to study requirements.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: the protocol regarding blood draws, diagnostic testing, and follow-up
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger
